body_html: Is there a quick fix to this without using ScatterNd? For instance, if the sparse tensor is complex, one could split into real and imaginary parts (not sure if this is available for a sparse tensor) and then call sparse_tensor_to_dense?

body: Is there a quick fix to this without using ScatterNd? For instance, if the sparse tensor is complex, one could split into real and imaginary parts (not sure if this is available for a sparse tensor) and then call sparse_tensor_to_dense?
